sub_title: Digital Marketing & E-commerce Specialist | 9+ Years of International Experience | Seeking New Opportunities
summary:
Embracing the digital revolution has been my journey for the past 9+ years, and I've navigated this landscape to help numerous brands forge meaningful connections with their target audiences. As a dedicated digital marketing professional, I specialize in crafting a seamless narrative across the digital realm, guiding brands towards exponential growth in both media exposure and sales performance.

💼 In a nutshell, my expertise encompasses:

• Crafting strategic digital communications and executing lucrative E-commerce strategies.
• Orchestrating the entire lifecycle of brand promotion in the digital space.
• Architecting and executing impactful performance and media campaigns for diverse brands.
• Steering digital product management from conceptualization to launch for applications, websites, and web-systems.

With a rich background spanning both the fast-moving consumer goods (FMCG) and pharmaceutical sectors, including prescription (RX) products, I bring comprehensive insights into every project. Moreover, I've demonstrated my prowess in creating digital departments from the ground up, illustrating my ability to lay the foundation for success.

🌐 Let's Connect: 
Email - shishovsergey@hotmail.com
All other ways to contact me via 1 link - https://bit.ly/m/shishovsergey

If it's digital, it's my playground. Let's collaborate and transform the digital landscape together.

profile_positions.title: Digital Manager (RX Retail) / E-commerce project lead

profile_positions.description:
• Developed and managed digital strategy to increase representation of 5 therapeutic groups of drugs (cardio, antibiotics, neurology, derma, and urology)
• Created patient-focused websites with reminders and educational articles, implemented paid search for all brands, and ran digital media campaigns for non-prescription drugs
• Built an application for chronic and new cardio patients with upskilling articles that educate on healthy living with these conditions
• Designed quizzes for medical representatives to engage and educate providers on our drugs and their benefits.

🎯 Key achievement:

• Implemented basic digital tools into the company's marketing strategy, including transitioning to a single agency model and developing a budget plan.
• Made the project analysis model more ROI-oriented.
profile_positions.title: Digital Manager (RX Retail)

profile_positions.description:
• Сonducted a media agency tender and developed a media buying strategy with an average TRP per brand of 1700, in close collaboration with the agency.
• Managed the shooting and localization processes of media materials for TV promotions for various brands.
• Developed and implemented a digital promotion strategy, including managing the A&P budget in collaboration with brand managers.
• Promoted a data-driven approach to optimize advertising campaigns, resulting in improved ROI and brand awareness

🎯 Key achievement:

• Developed and managed an advertising campaign for the Activia brand, leveraging the insight of "Post-New Year Overeating" to encourage consumers to use the product for 7 consecutive days to help restore digestive balance. This resulted in a 110% increase in net sales compared to plan, and a 102% increase compared to the previous year.
profile_positions.title: Digital & Media Manager
Digital Specialist

profile_positions.description:
• Implemented a digital media strategy across 6 Central Asian countries based on Nielsen's brand analytics, resulting in increased brand awareness through campaigns such as OLV and paid search.
• Localized and managed 6 product websites for CA countries in cooperation with a global agency, optimizing SEO, increasing reference mass, and developing a semantic core.
• Developed landing pages using Tilda and conducted online surveys in collaboration with brand managers.
• Prepared internal training materials on basic E-commerce knowledge and adapted creatives for E-commerce customers using our product photos to ensure up-to-date and accurate information on their websites, including major retail chains, brick and mortar stores, and delivery services.

🎯 Key achievement:

• Integrated QR codes with links to our company's websites on product packaging, resulting in an increase in website visits from 1000 to 25000 per month.
• Negotiated with online clients to conduct monthly giveaways on their social media platforms, resulting in reaching an audience of over 1.5 million people per month, with the cost of prizes being only our company's products.
profile_positions.title: Junior Digital manager / Assistant of brand manager (L&HC subdivision)
Marketing & E-commerce Specialist
Marketing and advertising specialist

profile_positions.description:
• Developed marketing plans and corporate identity materials, implemented a CRM system (megaplan.ru), and established customer service standards.
• Conducted digital marketing efforts, including website development, SEO optimization, contextual advertising, and media outreach.
• Created social media strategies, managed creative assets, and executed targeted advertising campaigns.

🎯 Key achievement:

• Improved company website ranking to top-5 for relevant search queries on Yandex and Google.
• Implemented a digital application to generate automated price quotes, reducing customer service time from 4-5 days to 5 hours.
• Created a project presentation template for managers to produce beautiful visual elements for clients.
• Revamped the financial model to focus on product and clear pricing.
